oracle.kubernetes.operator.work.Fiber

Packages that use Fiber 
Package Description
oracle.kubernetes.operator.work
User-level thread infrastructure for the Operator.

    Fiber FiberGate.startFiber​(java.lang.String key, Step strategy, Packet packet, Fiber.CompletionCallback callback)
    Starts Fiber that cancels any earlier running Fibers with the same key.
    Fiber FiberGate.startFiberIfLastFiberMatches​(java.lang.String key, Fiber old, Step strategy, Packet packet, Fiber.CompletionCallback callback)
    Starts Fiber only if the last started Fiber matches the given old Fiber.
    Fiber FiberGate.startFiberIfNoCurrentFiber​(java.lang.String key, Step strategy, Packet packet, Fiber.CompletionCallback callback)
    Starts Fiber only if there is no running Fiber with the same key.
